string.text: This portable repair kit contains tools that can fix your weapons and armors anywhere in The Zone. This kit is one use only, and fixes the most damaged item. If you would like to select the item to fix, remove all other equipped items.
9x18mm Heavy Ammo for Pistol and SMG. Certain artifact added to gunpowder and bullet greating better power and. However, the accuracy is decreased because of the artifacts.
9x19mm Heavy Ammo for Pistol and SMG. Certain artifact added to gunpowder and bullet greating better power and. However, the accuracy is decreased because of the artifacts.
5.56x45mm Heavy Ammo for Rifles. Certain artifact added to gunpowder and bullet greating better power and. However, the accuracy is decreased because of the artifacts.
9x39mm Heavy Ammo for Rifles. Certain artifact added to gunpowder and bullet greating better power and. However, the accuracy is decreased because of the artifacts.
